Text: Thank you so much. This is a VERY interesting subject and my daughter is doing a paper on this for her school. I myself find that there are more things to prove this theory than any religious "doctrin".

Everything in this movie has long since been debunked, but that's not to say it is not a classic.

The music, narrations, and directing are classics of a era which gave us ufo's, bigfoot and too many things that went bump in the night.

I must admit that even though its good entertainment EVD was a total fake, check out his own history. When he wrote 'Chariots....' he did so in the comfort of his own home in Switzerland - he never bothered to research the subject. 

But its a good bit of TV.

For other stuff on the subject, check out Graham Hancock, he will blow you away......
Cheers man, love Danikens books too.

Check Ancient Aliens (2009) 1280x720, History Channel from Erich. It's super video quality and compressed content of both movies from Erich von Daniken 1970 & 1976 year.

Having spoken with Von Daniken in the mid-90's on the Art Bell show 'Coast to Coast', I'm glad to see his classic film is still drawing interest. It still is as interesting and intriguing as ever. I will seed indefinitely.
